com.jaap.antitowerdefence.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaap.antitowerdefence.level.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Level.java A class that contains all of the components of a Anti Tower Defence level. It keeps track of active units, towers, terrain, level info and statistics.
    Author:
    Anna Osterlund, id10aod

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Terrain> walkable, Terrain[] buildable, LevelStats levelStats)
      Contructor for Level saves the walkable terrain for the units, the terrain where towers can be built and the level info of the level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level(java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Terrain> walkable,
             Terrain[] buildable,
             LevelStats levelStats)
        Contructor for Level saves the walkable terrain for the units, the terrain where towers can be built and the level info of the level. The unit arraylist is initiated.
        Parameters:
        walkable - - The walkable terrain in the level
        buildable - - The terrain where towers can be built in the level
        levelStats - - Level info and game statistics

      • addUnit

        public void addUnit(Unit unit)
        addUnit adds a unit to the ArrayList of units. The cost of the Unit is decreased from the players credit.
        Parameters:
        unit - - The unit to add to the ArrayList of active units

      • getUnits

        public java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Unit> getUnits()

        Returns:

      • setTowers

        public void setTowers(java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Tower> newTowers)
        setTowers replaces the tower array with a new array of towers and gives the new towers access to the ArrayList of units. It also signals the porpertyChangeListeners that the towers have changed.
        Parameters:
        towers - - the tower array to replace the old tower array

      • getTowers

        public java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Tower> getTowers()
        getTowers provides the towers in the level
        Returns:
        - array of towers in level

      • getLevelStats

        public LevelStats getLevelStats()
        getLevelStats provides the levelStats instance of the level
        Returns:
        - the LevelStats object of the level

      • unitReachedGoal

        public void unitReachedGoal(Unit unit)
        unitReachedGoal calculates the credits earned and adds this to the players current credits. It the player also recieves a score of 10 plus 10% of the units health
        Parameters:
        unit - - farmer, soldier or wizard

      • getSwitches

        public java.util.ArrayList<Terrain> getSwitches()
        getSwitches provides all switches in the level
        Returns:
        the switches
